Reviews.Title: Good deal excellent picture, Reliable!
Reviews.Author: Adam Hunt
Reviews.Content: Excellent Product! Vary easy to use once you are accustomed  to how it works, have used many times to see whats going on when gone,Used to record what goes on around my stored equipment, caught a worker using the phone around 10 times in a period of an hour , caught him sitting down many times and taking 5-15 min breaks out side  of our scheduled break times, Sound picks up decent, I think this is an area Zmodo needs to improve,  great for business owners like me,Caught people trying to get close to my dogs and possibly steal them, Showed video to police and was hard to make out there voices unless tv volume was all the way up  next project is to hook up to email to watch while away, Ill write back when thats complete too!
